info.+content: Bishōjo Senshi Sailor Moon Super S
Sailor Moon e il mistero dei sogni
美少女戦士セーラームーンSS
美少女戦士セーラームーンSuperS

The senshi fight against the Dead Moon Circus (Zirconia, Nehelenia, the Amazon Trio, the Amazoness Quartet), who wants to ultimately take over the world. This season is heavily centered around Chibi-usa and her relationship with Helios (Pegasus).
"Moonlight Densetsu" (ムーンライト伝説) by Moon Lips
"Sailor Moon Theme" by Nicole Price and Brynne Price [Cloverway English edited & uncut versions]
"Sailor Moon Theme (Reprise - Instrumental version)" by Nicole Price and Brynne Price [Cloverway English edited version]
#1: "Watashi-tachi ni Naritakute" (私たちになりたくて) by Miwako Fujitani (eps 1-13)
#2: "'Rashiku' Ikimasho" (“らしく”いきましょ) by Meu (eps 14-39)
"Route Venus" (ルート・ヴィーナス) by Rica Fukami (ep 154)
"Sailor Team no Theme" ( セーラーチームのテーマ) by Hiroko Asakawa (ep 161)
"Watashi-tachi ni Naritakute" (私たちになりたくて; Wanting to be Us) by Miwako Fujitani (eps 158-159)
Toei Animation's Sailor Moon SuperS Page
